item.title: Website Modifications
item.author: ricardo.chin@tecnico.ulisboa.pt (Ricardo Chin)
item.description: Based on UX/UI / bookHidden: true # Hugo Framework # info The wiki is built locally using the Hugo framework. You can run a local environment by following these steps: Install the Hugo Framework Clone this repo Run hugo server --minify in the root directory Open your browser and go to http://localhost:1313 (or as indicated by the Hugo output) Hugo Book Theme Modifications # I’ve customized Hugo Book theme template by modifying default settings to offer users more detailed information.
